referralsForm.copyBottom: Note: Enter your Emeritus email id you use to login into salesforce

errors.emailPattern: Must be a valid email address

learningWithFriendsBenefits: The benefit of learning together with your friend is that you keep each other accountable and have meaningful discussions about what you're learning.

flexiPay.title: Flexible Payment Options Available
flexiPay.discounts: Any discounts will be applied at checkout.

copyLinkParagraph: Copy your personal referral link below to share with colleagues.
shareViaEmailParagraph: Enter multiple comma-separated emails to share with colleagues.
inviteSentTitle: Congrats! Your invite has been sent! When your colleague joins a program and stays enrolled, you will receive a discount equal to their savings.
inviteSentSubtitle: You save every time one of your referrals enrolls. Keep sharing to earn more rewards!
sendAdditionalEmails: Send additional emails to more colleagues
couponCode: Remember to apply coupon code at checkout: {{coupon}}

referralModal.title: Congratulations
referralModal.subtitle: You have been invited to {{program_name}}.
referralModal.subtitleTwo: To get started, please complete the information form on the following page.

listItems.listItemThree: Learn together and enjoy {{friends_reward_amount}} off your program fees

enterpriseB2b.title: Thank you for your interest in the program.
enterpriseB2b.greetingTxt: You will receive an email with a link to the program brochure and next steps.
enterpriseB2b.emailContactDetails: Have questions about the course or how to enroll? Email us at group-enrollments@emeritus.org. We attempt to respond to inquiries as quickly as possible, but please allow 24-48 hrs for response.
enterpriseB2b.policyContactDetails: Please contact your manager or HR business partner.
enterpriseB2b.applyContactDetails: enterprise.clientsuccess@emeritus.org. We attempt to respond to queries in 24 hours or less. However, over weekends and holidays, our responses may take up to 72 hours.
